text: Until you work as hard as those you admire, don't explain away their success as luck.
author: Unknown

text: If you don't sacrifice for your dream, then your dream becomes your sacrifice.
author: Unknown

text: I believe that things only gonna change when you get into 'Action'.
author: Unknown

text: Ideas are worthless unless we act on them.
author: Unknown

text: My motivation for a work to get started is 'Progress'.
author: Unknown

text: Fail before 20, retire before 30, make sure you do what you love.
author: Unknown

text: We become what we think about.
author: Unknown

text: Thoughts create energy, energy creates matter.
author: Unknown

text: Seek wealth, not money or status.
author: Unknown

text: I know nothing, but I'm ready to learn anything (earlier in your career).
author: Unknown

text: Progress is better than perfection.
author: Unknown

text: If you do what is easy, your life will be hard. If you do what is hard, your life will be easy.
author: Unknown

text: If you don't fail, you are not even trying.
author: Unknown

text: To get something you never had, you have to do something you never did.
author: Unknown

text: Nothing in life is worthwhile, unless you take 'Risks'.
author: Unknown

text: There is no passion to be found playing small and settling for a life that's less than the one you're capable of living.
author: Unknown

text: Every pro was once a beginner.
author: Unknown

text: Don't be a programmer, be a problem solver.
author: Unknown

text: Action causes motivation, inaction causes stress/anxiety.
author: Unknown

text: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable.
author: Unknown

text: Don't show your plans, show them your results.
author: Unknown

text: Leaders are readers.
author: Unknown

text: Self-care and self-love is not selfish.
author: Unknown

text: Knowledge is power, reading is 'Superpower'.
author: Unknown

text: Sometimes, happiness is a choice, which I don't want to make.
author: Unknown

text: Things that come easy, will go easy. Good things take time.
author: Unknown

text: If you wish to be more visible in the world, you will have to do a lot of Invisible work.
author: Unknown

text: Failure is a delay, not defeat.
author: Unknown

text: Focus on accuracy first—speed will come naturally with practice.
author: Unknown

text: The day you plant the seed is not the day you eat the fruit.
author: Unknown

text: Confuse them with your silence and shock them with your results.
author: Unknown

text: The razor blade is sharp but can't cut a tree, the axe is strong but can't cut hair.
author: Unknown

text: Your hard-work is pointless, if you're not enjoying it. Enjoy the journey.
author: Unknown

text: The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in war.
author: Unknown

text: Hunger kills more than war.
author: Unknown

text: The most successful people in the world choose education over entertainment.
author: Unknown

text: Ultimately, we all just want to be happy. Stay cool, stay happy.
author: Unknown

text: The only real failure in life is when you stop trying. Don't give up.
author: Unknown

text: Don't sell your time.
author: Unknown

text: If you choose a job you love, you'll never have to work a day in your life. Works become play.
author: Unknown

text: I fear not the man who practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who practiced 1 kick 10,000 times.
author: Unknown

text: It's okay to be imperfect for short period of time.
author: Unknown

text: Jack of all trades, master of none. Focus on one thing at a time.
author: Unknown

text: Just because you're busy doesn't mean you're productive. Get into a flow state and do deep work without distractions.
author: Unknown

text: Humans can speak without thinking. But it is impossible to write without thinking. High quality books over anything.
author: Unknown

text: Money buys you freedom in the materialistic world.
author: Unknown

text: The computer was the most powerful tool ever invented by humanity—now it's AI. Leverage and make it your superpower.
author: Unknown

text: You can't be normal and expect abnormal results.
author: Unknown

text: If you're in depression, you're living in the past. If you're in anxiety, you're living in the future. If you're in peace, you're living in the present.
author: Unknown

text: The best time to start was yesterday. The second best time is today.
author: Unknown

text: Multitasking is an art to ruin two things at a time.
author: Unknown

text: The most powerful thing to overcome in the world is emotion.
author: Unknown

text: Good is okay, but greatness is a choice.
author: Unknown

text: A man has two lives; the second begins when he realizes he only has one.
author: Unknown

text: Hard work beats talent, but consistency beats even hard work.
author: Unknown

text: Quantity produces quality.
author: Unknown

text: Hard work in the beginning leads to smart work.
author: Unknown

text: Don't learn then start; start then learn.
author: Unknown

text: Sometimes, you have to go through a material breakdown to achieve a spiritual breakthrough.
author: Unknown

text: Don't give up what you want most for what feels good in the moment. Delayed gratification over instant gratification.
author: Unknown

text: Just because someone doesn't post on social media doesn't mean they don't have a life. It could also mean they are living more of it beyond social media.
author: Unknown

text: If you're confident, you won't feel the need to compare yourself to others. If you're focused and productive, you won't have time to scroll on social media.
author: Unknown

text: An idiot admires complexity; a genius admires simplicity.
author: Unknown

text: Desire is the enemy of happiness.
author: Unknown

text: How you do one thing is how you do everything—most of the time.
author: Unknown

text: Most people overestimate what they can achieve in a year and underestimate what they can achieve in ten years.
author: Unknown

text: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Unknown

text: Time is the new currency.
author: Unknown

text: Whenever you're feeling low, go take a shower.
author: Unknown

text: You will never be criticized by someone who is doing more than you, you will only be criticized by someone who is doing less than you—most of the time.
author: Unknown

text: A winner is just a loser who tried one more time.
author: Unknown

text: If you ever need motivation to get rich, go to a club and don't drink.
author: Unknown

text: We only tend to regret the things we didn't do, rather than the things we did do.
author: Unknown

text: Broke people spend time to save money. Rich people spend money to save money.
author: Unknown

text: You only need to win once.
author: Unknown

text: Learning without taking action is still learning.
author: Unknown

text: Making an extra $10k is easier than trying to save $10k.
author: Elon Musk

text: Learn from experts who've invested 10,000 hours—so you don't have to.
author: Unknown

text: Impatient with Actions, Patient with Results.
author: Unknown

text: Inspiration is perishable so take action immediately when you feel inspired.
author: Unknown

text: Your lifestyle is your opponent's greatest asset.
author: Unknown

text: Money is life. People trade their time for money. Get back your life by becoming financially independent.
author: Unknown

text: To become rich in 20's, you require psychopathic levels of commitment, sacrifice, and obsession.
author: Unknown

text: Business is just a reflection of your personal life.
author: Unknown

text: "Luck" is a combination of what you do, who you do it with, and how many times you show up. If you want to get lucky, do the right things with the right people for a long time without many long breaks. That's where magic happens.
author: Unknown

text: The simplest way to live the life you want is to decide what that is, and say no to everything that isn't that. Simple not easy.
author: Alex Hormozi

text: The biggest risk to your future isn't your competition, it's the distractions you insist on keeping in your life rather than doing the things you know you should be doing but aren't.
author: Alex Hormozi

text: The fastest way to change your life is to change who you compare yourself to.
author: Alex Hormozi

text: If you have nothing in your life, but you have at least one person that loves you unconditionally, it'll do wonders in your self-esteem.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: Books make for great friends, because the best thinkers of the last few thousand years tell you their nuggets of wisdom.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: A busy calendar and a busy mind will destroy your ability to do great things in this world. If you want to do great things—whether you're a musician or entrepreneur or investor—you need free time and a free mind.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: Willpower is finite. Motivation is perishable.
author: Unknown

text: Avoid taking advice from someone who's never been where you're going.
author: Unknown

text: Insecure people call you insecure. Paranoid people call you paranoid. Don't let them gaslight you—stay strong.
author: Unknown

text: If you are ambitious, never limit yourself. Don't set any limitations.
author: Unknown

text: There is no motivation without deprivation.
author: Unknown

text: Show me your YouTube, and I'll tell you your goals. Show me your calendar, and I'll tell you how serious you are about them.
author: Unknown

text: If you're living in poor and desperately want to become rich, don't listen to peers in your current circle. Change your environment—or at least be alone and surround yourself with virtual mentors.
author: Unknown

text: Be intentional about your social circle.
author: Unknown

text: You are the average of the people you spend your time with.
author: Unknown

text: The people you habitually associate with determine as much as 95 percent of your success or failure in life.
author: Harvard reference group study

text: If someone isn't helping you reach your goals, either change the person or change your goals.
author: Unknown

text: You are crazy until you become rich/successful.
author: Unknown

text: The quality of relationships matters more than quantity.
author: Unknown

text: Sleep is non-negotiable.
author: Unknown

text: Show me your screen time, and I'll tell you your focus.
author: Unknown

text: Control the senses, overcome desire, act skillfully without attachment, and find fulfillment in the action itself rather than its rewards.
author: Bhagavad Gita

text: Failures don't matter, you only truly fail when you quit. As long as you keep improving and trying again, you're winning.
author: Unknown

text: Don't let money inflate your ego and make you look down on others.
author: Unknown

text: Do good deeds, donate money, and make the world a better place when you have plenty of money.
author: Unknown

text: It's not just about what you know—it's about being in the right place, with the right people, at the right time.
author: Unknown

text: Your life is not what you dream, feel, or say—it's the sum of the decisions you've made. And before every decision comes a thought—thinking.
author: Unknown

text: Think. Plan. Execute.
author: Unknown

text: Criticism is good feedback if you listen unemotionally.
author: Unknown

text: Have strong opinions loosely held.
author: Unknown

text: 80% of health is sleep, diet, and exercise.
author: Unknown

text: The only true test of intelligence is if you get what you wanted out of life.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: ATTENTION is all you need.
author: Unknown
